creator: rapolu.srinivas@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 31575
Tomcat Profiling CPU usage

We are using Tomcat 7.0.39, and Sometimes CPU goes high when we restart the TOMCAT.

We have to stop the Tomcat in-order to release the release resources and again restarting the Tomcat fixes the problem.

On profiling, found that Invocations on
sum.rmi.transport.tcp.TCPTransport$ConnectionHandler.run() keep on getting increased and occupy more CPU.

Please find attachment for more information.

Can you please let us know if there is any open BUG for the same?
